body.section: Hierarchy EmergencyEncounter is a kind of EncounterEvent

section.title: Description
section.p: Emergency is an encounter without a scheduled appointment and urgent clinical services are required.

stentry.p: "The time interval starting with the administrative onset of the encounter (e.g. admission, registration, patient arrival) and ending with the patient's departure (e.g. discharge). (HL7).
Identifies the mode of transportation. ie. ambulance, car, walking etc.
The release of a patient from a course of care.
